attributes.action: Find out how many people are now in debt because of the Child Tax Credit System !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Petition has been set up to find out how many people are now in debt because of the Child Tax Credit System. 
I also would like to know why innocent families are being penilised and left with debt due to the Child Tax Credits mistakes and when is the system going to be changed !!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
